dcterms:description: This dataset compares the average global exposure of the population induced by a macro 3G network in different geographical areas in France and Serbia.

dcterms:description: This dataset involves measuring electromagnetic fields in 5G technology using 5G smartphones to capture exposure levels.

dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on in-situ measurement methodology for assessing 5G NR massive MIMO base station exposure at sub-6 GHz frequencies.

dcterms:description: This dataset provides a statistical estimation of EMF exposure from 5G massive MIMO networks using stochastic geometry in mmwave bands.

dcterms:description: This dataset discusses EMF-aware cellular networks, addressing misinformation, open questions, and potential solutions regarding 5G and EMF exposure.
dcterms:title: EMF-aware cellular networks

dcterms:description: This dataset examines health risks associated with 5G exposure from a communications engineering perspective.
dcterms:title: Health risks associated with 5G exposure

dcterms:description: This dataset provides compliance assessments for electromagnetic field exposure in 5G wireless networks.
dcterms:title: EMF exposure compliance assessments for 5G wireless networks
